name: COLDsnap
description:
This was a quick jam prototype that I built with @dumpstertree. It's sort of like Towerfall with a freeze/melee combat mechanic. We built this out in about 16 hours, let us know what you think!

NOTE: Though we uploaded a Windows build, this has only been tested on macOS and requires two Xbox 360 controllers as input. I have a feeling that using a different combination of gamepads and operating systems will have the buttons not work properly, but we're gonna try to update the game with a more robust input system sometime soon.
